titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 48) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2011, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-33, by Mr. Woodall.
All points of order against consideration of the joint resolution are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 17.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 167.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 167, the Chair put the question on agreeing to the resolution, and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of adoption until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 241 - 181 (Roll no. 177).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/14/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 48) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2011.
